content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. What price were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 500 euros per month would be a good starting point.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. It's much lower than what I'm looking for. How about 750 euros per month? I believe that's a fair price for the location and amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite a gap. I would be willing to pay 600 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but I'm sorry, 600 euros is still not high enough for me. Let's find a middle ground. How about 650 euros per month? This is a nice, round number that I believe is fair for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 625 euros per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. I'm looking for a minimum of 650 euros per month. If we cannot agree on this price, I'm afraid I will have to terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price difference is too large.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your position, Emilia. It was nice doing business with you. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
